entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tadoule Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -32.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tadoule Lake Airport 04:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -32.8°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -36.4°C
Wind: W 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
